name: luca

target_roles.title: ship assistant engineer
target_roles.description: Ship assistant engineers assist the ship chief engineer and the ship duty engineer in the operations of the ship's hull. They support the operation of the main engines, steering mechanism, electrical generation and other major subsystems. They communicate with maritime engineers about the performance of technical operations. They also ensure appropriate safety and regulatory standards compliance and are able to take on higher level positions if needed.
target_roles.essential_skills:
Perform routine maintenance of ship engines
Maintain vessel engine room
Help prepare lifeboats
Global maritime distress and safety system
Operate diesel propulsion plants
Principles of mechanical engineering
Unmoor vessels
Perform routine lube oil tests
Engine components
Perform bunkering
Manage on-board water systems
Operate fire extinguishers
Provide support in vessel machinery systems
Operate sewage treatment plants on ships
Maintain vessel inventory
Operation of different engines
Prepare engine room for operation
Manage ship electrical systems
Operate vessel engine room
Use maritime english
Use different types of fire extinguishers
Regulation on the discharge of raw materials into the sea
Manage vessel engines and systems
Repair vessel mechanical systems
Electrical systems used in transportation
Moor vessels
target_roles.optional_skills:
Maritime transportation technology
Act reliably
Advise on maritime subjects
Apply vessel engine regulations
Physics
International maritime organisation conventions
Detect malfunctions in engines

target_roles.title: ICT intelligent systems designer
target_roles.description: ICT intelligent systems designers apply methods of artificial intelligence in engineering, robotics and computer science to design programs which simulate intelligence including thinking models, cognitive and knowledge-based systems, problem solving, and decision making. They also integrate structured knowledge into computer systems (ontologies, knowledge bases) in order to solve complex problems normally requiring a high level of human expertise or artificial intelligence methods.

Business process modelling
